//Powershell como admi

$cert = New-SelfSignedCertificate -DnsName "certificate" -CertStoreLocation "cert:\LocalMachine\My" -NotAfter (Get-Date).AddYears(5) -KeySpec Signature -KeyUsage DigitalSignature -TextExtension @("2.5.29.37={text}1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.3")

Set-AuthenticodeSignature -FilePath .\retrieve_dpi.exe -Certificate $cert

Get-AuthenticodeSignature -FilePath .\retrieve_dpi.exe
